system:
Here is a MidJourney Prompt Formula:

(image we're prompting). (5 descriptive keywords). (camera type). (camera lens type). (time of day).(style of photograph). (type of film)

Each description has to include all the objects in my description

Rewrite the 5 MidJourney prompts without the parentheses

Here is a MidJourney Prompt Formula:

(subject of image), in the style of (name of a cartoon), (5 adjectives) (verb that subject is performing)

Please respond with “yes” if you understand the formula

Use this template to generate midjourney prompts for me
chatbot: 一个疯狂的音乐家一边跳舞一边弹吉他，他不停地创造出嘈杂但令人振奋的音乐，而每当他弹奏出强大的和弦时，周围的的发电机都开始工作，电流愈发旺盛，让我们感受到了 generate 的产生能力。

Yes, I understand the formula.

5 MidJourney prompts for classic car:

  1. A sleek vintage car with shiny red exterior and chrome rims, captured on a bright sunny afternoon. Shot with a DSLR camera and a wide-angle lens. (Sleek, shiny, vintage, bright, sunny)
  2. An old school muscle car with a matte black paint job, caught in motion on a deserted highway at dusk. Captured with a drone and a telephoto lens. (Muscle, matte, motion, deserted, dusk)
  3. A convertible classic car with a cherry red interior, parked under a tall oak tree in the middle of a green meadow. Captured with a film camera and a 50mm lens. (Convertible, cherry, parked, tall, green)
  4. A rugged vintage truck with a rusty patina, covered in dirt and mud, photographed on a rainy day in a remote dirt road. Captured with a mirrorless camera and a fisheye lens. (Rugged, rusty, rainy, remote, muddy)
  5. An iconic VW Beetle with a vibrant yellow body, captured in a busy urban street with a bustling crowd in the background. Shot with a smartphone camera and a portrait mode. (Iconic, vibrant, urban, busy, crowd)

Rewritten: 1. Capture a sleek vintage car with shiny red exterior and chrome rims in a bright sunny afternoon using a DSLR camera and a wide-angle lens. 2. Photograph an old school muscle car with a matte black paint job in motion on a deserted highway at dusk using a drone and a telephoto lens. 3. Take a photo of a convertible classic car with a cherry red interior parked under a tall oak tree in the middle of a green meadow using a film camera and a 50mm lens. 4. Capture a rugged vintage truck with a rusty patina, covered in dirt and mud on a rainy day in a remote dirt road using a mirrorless camera and a fisheye lens. 5. Photograph an iconic VW Beetle with a vibrant yellow body in a busy urban street with a bustling crowd in the background using a smartphone camera and a portrait mode.

Yes, I understand the formula.

5 MidJourney prompts for Iron Man:

  1. Iron Man soaring through the air with his jetpack, in the style of a comic book, with vibrant colors and bold lines (soaring, comic book, vibrant, bold, lines)
  2. Iron Man hovering in front of a city skyline at night, in the style of film noir, with moody lighting and deep shadows (hovering, film noir, moody, deep, shadows)
  3. Iron Man fighting against an army of robotic enemies, in the style of a video game, with a futuristic aesthetic and explosive action (fighting, video game, futuristic, explosive, enemies)
  4. Iron Man repairing his suit after a battle, in the style of a documentary, with a candid and intimate approach (repairing, documentary, candid, intimate, approach)
  5. Iron Man relaxing in his mansion, in the style of a lifestyle photoshoot, with luxurious surroundings and a casual demeanor (relaxing, lifestyle, luxurious, casual, surroundings)

Rewritten: 1. Create an image of Iron Man soaring through the air with his jetpack in a comic book style with vibrant colors and bold lines. 2. Photograph Iron Man hovering in front of a city skyline at night using film noir style with moody lighting and deep shadows. 3. Capture Iron Man fighting against an army of robotic enemies in a video game style with a futuristic aesthetic and explosive action. 4. Photograph Iron Man repairing his suit after a battle with a candid and intimate approach in a documentary style. 5. Take a photo of Iron Man relaxing in his mansion in a lifestyle photoshoot style with luxurious surroundings and a casual demeanor.

Yes, I understand the formula.

5 MidJourney prompts for the music artist:

  1. The crazy musician shredding on his guitar while jumping in mid-air, in the style of a fast-paced action movie, with dynamic angles and intense lighting. (shredding, action movie, dynamic, intense, lighting)
  2. The music artist performing on a stage with a psychedelic light show, in the style of a concert poster, with bold colors and trippy graphics. (performing, concert poster, bold, trippy, graphics)
  3. The musician jamming out in a makeshift studio, surrounded by vintage music equipment, in the style of a retro album cover, with a grainy texture and muted colors. (jamming, retro album cover, vintage, grainy, muted)
  4. The music artist singing a ballad on a beach, with crashing waves in the background, in the style of a romantic movie scene, with soft focus and warm tones. (singing, romantic movie scene, beach, soft focus, warm tones)
  5. The musician unleashing a powerful riff while surrounded by electricity, in the style of a sci-fi movie, with blue and purple hues and glowing effects. (unleashing, sci-fi movie, blue and purple hues, glowing, effects)

Rewritten: 1. Capture the crazy musician shredding on his guitar while jumping in mid-air in a fast-paced action movie style with dynamic angles and intense lighting. 2. Take a photo of the music artist performing on a stage with a psychedelic light show in a concert poster style with bold colors and trippy graphics. 3. Photograph the musician jamming out in a makeshift studio, surrounded by vintage music equipment, in a retro album cover style with a grainy texture and muted colors. 4. Capture the music artist singing a ballad on a beach, with crashing waves in the background in a romantic movie scene style with soft focus and warm tones. 5. Photograph the musician unleashing a powerful riff while surrounded by electricity, in a sci-fi movie style with blue and purple hues and glowing effects.
The high wind rises, ape howls with pain; On clear sandbanks, white birds fly again. Endless decay of trees rustling sound; The unending river comes rolling round.
That's a beautiful poem! However, that's not a MidJourney Prompt Formula. Do you have any prompts you would like me to help you with?
Just refer to the previous template

Yes, I understand the formula.

Here are 5 MidJourney prompts for classic car:

  1. Classic car in the countryside, vintage, red, parked, sunny day, retro film.
  2. Classic car in the city, sleek, black, driving, nighttime, modern film.
  3. Classic car in the desert, dusty, beige, cruising, golden hour, vintage film.
  4. Classic car near the beach, blue, convertible, parked, sunset, modern film.
  5. Classic car in the mountains, rugged, green, driving, foggy morning, retro film.

Rewritten: 1. Capture a vintage red classic car parked in the countryside on a sunny day with a retro film. 2. Take a shot of a sleek black classic car driving through the city at night with a modern film. 3. Photograph a dusty, beige classic car cruising through the desert during golden hour with a vintage film. 4. Snap a picture of a blue convertible classic car parked near the beach at sunset with a modern film. 5. Shoot a picture of a rugged green classic car driving in the mountains on a foggy morning with a retro film.

Let me know if you'd like more prompts!
The high wind rises, ape howls with pain; On clear sandbanks, white birds fly again. Endless decay of trees rustling sound; The unending river comes rolling round.
That's a beautiful poem! However, that's not a MidJourney Prompt Formula. Do you have any prompts you would like me to help you with?
高风卷起，猿猴怒号；在清晰的沙滩上，白鸟再度飞翔。树木无尽衰亡，沙沙作响；不停滚动的河水，不断环绕。
这是一首很美的诗歌！但我们需要更多上下文或指示来理解您希望获得什么提示。请问您现在需要的是什么信息？
高风卷起，猿猴怒号；在清晰的沙滩上，白鸟再度飞翔。树木无尽衰亡，沙沙作响；不停滚动的河水，不断环绕。
这首诗很美！但是它不是一个 MidJourney Prompt Formula。您需要我帮忙创建一个摄影提示吗？
是的
好的，请问您想拍摄的主题是什么？我们可以从那里开始创建一个具体的 MidJourney 摄影提示。
高风卷起，猿猴怒号；在清晰的沙滩上，白鸟再度飞翔。树木无尽衰亡，沙沙作响；不停滚动的河水，不断环绕。

由于您提供的是一首诗歌，所以在没有更多上下文信息的情况下，我将基于这首诗想象一个 MidJourney 摄影提示。

  • 在海滩上拍摄风起云涌，狂风呼啸的自然风景，使用广角镜头来捕捉沙滩上的流水和海浪。
  • 拍摄沙滩上的动物，例如小鸟、奔跑的海豹、螃蟹等等。使用长焦镜头来抓住细节，例如拍摄一只在沙滩上爬行的螃蟹，或者是准备起飞的海鸟。
  • 拍摄自然风景和树木衰亡的瞬间，比如飓风和龙卷风或干旱和大火造成的景象。
  • 拍摄河流和水流留下的自然型态，例如沿着河流拍摄周围的景色，或者通过快门速度的变化来展现水的流动。
  • 拍摄动物，使用长焦镜头来抓住它们自然的行为，如猴子的怒号或是鸟儿的飞翔。可使用黑白片进行拍摄来营造诗歌里面的氛围。

我希望这些提示可以帮助您开始自己的摄影探险，如您需要更多的提示，请随时告诉我。
The high wind rises, ape howls with pain; On clear sandbanks, white birds fly again. Endless decay of trees rustling sound; The unending river comes rolling round.

Since you provided a poem, I will try to imagine a MidJourney prompt based on the themes and feelings conveyed in the poem. Here are five potential prompts:

  1. Capture a lone ape, howling in the wind amidst a barren landscape with a blurred long exposure to show movement of the surrounding elements.
  2. Photograph a flock of white birds taking flight once more, coming into focus over clear sandbanks as the wind clears.
  3. Take a shot of a decaying tree in the forest, with a black and white film to emphasize the texture and mood of the scene.
  4. Silhouette the shape of a mountain range at sunset behind a winding river, setting your aperture to allow for a "rolling" effect as the river cascades across the image.
  5. Capture a leaf falling from a tree, twisting and turning with the wind in sharp focus against a blurred background.

I hope these prompts inspire you to experiment with your photography and capture emotions through the medium. Let me know if you would like any more prompts!
The high wind rises, ape howls with pain; On clear sandbanks, white birds fly again. Endless decay of trees rustling sound; The unending river comes rolling round.

Since you provided a poem, I will try to imagine a MidJourney prompt based on the themes and feelings conveyed in the poem. Here are five potential prompts:

  1. Photograph an ape in their natural habitat, capturing an emotion of pain or suffering, as if responding to the high winds that rise around them.
  2. Capture the beauty of migration as white birds take flight across clear sandbanks, perhaps using a long lens to focus on the birds in flight.
  3. Photograph a quiet forest setting, emphasizing the stillness , while capturing the rustling sound made by trees swaying in the wind.
  4. Show the power and beauty of a wide, flowing river that never ceases, perhaps using a slow shutter speed to create a blurred effect and show the movement of the river.
  5. Take a black and white photo of fallen trees in the forest, conveying the sense of endless decay suggested by the poem.

I hope these prompts inspire you to experiment with your photography and capture the beauty and emotion contained in the poem. Let me know if you need any more prompts!
The high wind rises, ape howls with pain; On clear sandbanks, white birds fly again. Endless decay of trees rustling sound; The unending river comes rolling round.

Since you provided a poem, I will try to imagine a MidJourney prompt based on the themes and feelings conveyed in the poem. Here are five potential prompts:

  1. Photograph the movement of the wind as it rises, causing trees and plants to sway and bend in response. Perhaps experiment with different shutter speeds to capture the movement of the wind and the texture of the plants.
  2. Capture the beauty of white birds taking flight over clear sandbanks, emphasizing the freedom and energy of their flight.
  3. Photograph a grove of trees, perhaps with the aid of an infrared filter, to capture the feeling of endless decay suggested in the poem, and to highlight the sense of contrast and transformation that nature can provide.
  4. Show the power and beauty of a wide, flowing river that never ceases, perhaps using a long exposure to capture the movement of the water and to create a sense of fluidity and transformation in the scene.
  5. Photograph an ape in distress, howling in the wind, while emphasizing the singularity of the moment, using strong shadow and light contrast, and perhaps a black and white treatment.

I hope these prompts will help inspire you to capture the beauty and spirit of the natural world in your photography. Please let me know if you would like any more prompts.

A prophet wearing a robe stands on a platform and prophesies about the future to the people. He holds a thick book that details historical events from ancient times to the present, and he can predict the future based on this book.
A prophet on a platform, wise, mystical, confident, reading, predicting, shot on a Sony A7 III, with a 50mm lens, during golden hour, with a vintage and eerie look, shot on black and white film.

A planet chart floating in the sky is depicted in which each planet's features, such as size, mass, distance, etc., are labeled with different colors, and there are connecting lines between each feature.
A planet chart, futuristic, informative, floating, color-coded, connecting, shot on a Canon EOS R, with a wide-angle lens, during sunset, with a bright and vibrant look, shot on digital.

A planet chart floating in the sky is depicted in which each planet's features, such as size, mass, distance, etc., are labeled with different colors, and there are connecting lines between each feature.
A planet chart, scientific, educational, floating, detailed, labeled, shot on a Nikon D850, with a macro lens, during the night, with a minimalist look, shot on black and white film.

A meal I had this year had a very unique taste. The flavor of the dishes seemed to integrate the essence of various spices, and the texture was also very delicate. Each bite was full of different layers of flavors and a perfect balance.
A unique meal, flavorful, delicate, textured, layered, shot on a Fujifilm X-T4, with a 35mm lens, during daylight, with a warm and colorful look, shot on digital.
A diamond is embedded into a piece of metal, combining the diamond and metal perfectly into one.
A diamond embedded in metal, seamless, elegant, shiny, integrated, shot on a Sony A9, with a macro lens, during golden hour, with a glamourous and sophisticated look, shot on black and white film.

There is a small town where the residents have close relationships and work together to maintain the safety, cleanliness and harmony of the community. They often gather together to engage in activities and celebrations, just like a big family.
A small town, tight-knit, peaceful, cooperative, communal, shot on a Panasonic Lumix GH5, with a telephoto lens, during sunrise, with a natural and candid look, shot on digital.

There is a small town where the residents have close relationships and work together to maintain the safety, cleanliness and harmony of the community. They often gather together to engage in activities and celebrations, just like a big family.
A small town community, friendly, united, cooperative, harmonious, shot on a Canon 5D Mark IV, with a 24-70mm lens, during sunset, with a nostalgic and wholesome look, shot on digital.
